title: Bacon & Mushroom Rigatoni
instructions: Cook rigatoni according to package directions until al dente, reserve 1 cup pasta water
Cut bacon into small pieces and cook in large skillet until crispy
Remove bacon with slotted spoon, leave fat in pan
Slice mushrooms and saut√© in bacon fat until golden, about 5 minutes
Add minced shallots and garlic, cook 1 minute until fragrant
Add white wine and let simmer until reduced by half
Pour in heavy cream and bring to gentle simmer
Add cooked pasta and bacon back to pan with sauce
Toss with pasta water as needed to reach desired consistency
Season with salt and black pepper to taste
